title: Well Done
comment: I love the simplicity. There's one small feature in my other phone's player that I've wanted but could not find in any other but this one- when you pause to skip to a new song it doesn't automatically start playing the next song. This way i can skip songs to the one i want without having to hear the start of all the ones in-between. Thank and you!

title: Tiny,
